channel.title: Progressive Party of America
channel.description: Recent content on Progressive Party of America

item.title: Sydney For America 2040 Campaign Platform
item.description: From Corporate Greed to Human Need Preamble In 1776, our nation united against tyranny and oppression to declare independence from the British Empire. This moment marked the beginning of our journey toward securing life, liberty, and the pursuit of happiness for all Americans. While our constitution was created to ensure the well-being of our people and safeguard our freedoms, we currently face significant inequality. The top one percent of income earners possess thirty percent of our wealth, while the bottom fifty percent own less than three percent.
